awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: An imaginative Disney version of the Robin Hood legend. Fun and romance abound as the swashbuckling hero of Sherwood Forest and his valiant sidekick plot one daring adventure after another to outwit the greedy prince and his partner as they put the tax squeeze on the poor.
plot: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.
title: Robin Hood

tomatoes.consensus: One of the weaker Disney adaptations, Robin Hood is cute and colorful but lacks the majesty and excitement of the studio's earlier efforts.

writers: Ken Anderson (based on: character and story conceptions by)
